flammability.2: **Flammability** Must be heated or high ambient temperature before ignition
flammability.3: **Flammability** Can be ignited under almost all ambient temperatures
flammability.4: **Flammability** Will vaporize and readily burn at normal temperatures

health.2: **Health** Can cause temporary incapaciations or residual injuries
health.3: **Health** Can cause serious or permanent damage

reactivity.1: **Reactivitiy** Normally stable. High temperature make unstable
reactivity.2: **Reactivitiy** Violent chemical change at high temperatures or pressures
reactivity.3: **Reactivitiy** May explode at high temperatures or shock
reactivity.4: **Reactivitiy** May explode at normal temperatures or pressures

specialNotice.W: **Special** Reacts violently or explosively with water

about.content:
This software was developed as part of my Bachelor Thesis in Electrical Engineering and Information Technology at the University of Applied Science, Hochschule DÃ¼sseldorf. The thesis was supervised by Prof. Dr. rer. nat. Wolfgang Lux and B. Eng. Frederik Feichtmeier.

The complete thesis can be viewed here: https://thesis.kuhlti.me/output.pdf.
